Reviews.Title: Ok, but needs help in the focus precision and depth of field
Reviews.Author: Dena T Pope
Reviews.Content: I purchased 3 of these cameras. The picture isn't bad, but I used coax cable with compression fittings instead of the cheap cables that come pre-made for security cameras - this cuts down on a lot of video noise that is caused by interference. I also went into the OSD menu and set it up for an outside environment and turned on the noise filtering, WDR, and AGC, which were all defaulted to OFF. The only problem I have had is with the vari-focal. It is easy enought to zoom in and out - but focusing is the problem. There is no aperture adjustment and the depth of field is shallow, so, with a lot of playing around you can get an almost sharp focus on a subject, but stuff closer or further away from that subject will get increasingly blurry the farther they are from the focus point. I've had the cameras running for a little over a month now. No other issues.

Reviews.Title: Great product, great support, great picture
Reviews.Author: nanob3
Reviews.Content: I received delivery of this camera less than 24 hours after ordering it. I am using it to replace one of my 8 Q-see cameras on a QS408 system. The daytime picture quality is far, far better than my Q-see's. The colors are accurate the zoom and focus features are great. If you buy one don't make the mistake I made by turning the sun visor around. The white surface reflected back in to the camera at night made it hard to see anything. The documentation has no tech support phone number, just an email address which annoyed me. I called Amazon and they couldn't find a phone number either, so I waited. Fortunately GW (Great Wall) Security responded within 36 hours giving me a phone number to call. Once I was in touch with them my problem was quickly resolved. I am now happy I bought this camera and I will buy more when needed. If you need to reach their tech support I'll save you some time, the number is 626-350-0555.

Reviews.Title: Sunshade needs better screws
Reviews.Author: Gregory St.Helene
Reviews.Content: Camera has excellent focus and zoom and really produces an almost colorless daylight sharp image at night. However I had to replace the screws to hold the sunshade which are too small and flimsy in quality. Other than that the camera has been working very well.

Reviews.Title: Quality camera, great customer service
Reviews.Author: JP "JP"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the GW50WD camera from GW Security.  Had some difficulty but not with the camera quality or their product.  Their customer service was exemplary.  They bent over backwards to resolve our issues at no cost to us.  I would HIGHLY recommend them as a seller to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Condensation
Reviews.Author: ccblack
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for less than 30 days and it has Condensation inside on the glass cover!......Not what I was expecting.

Reviews.Title: Works As expected
Reviews.Author: bashbish "bashbish"
Reviews.Content: I bought this because it has 2.8mm Wide Angle. so I could shoot it on my entire back yard.The night vision IR is very good but does not have as wide a scope as the lens so it only lights up the center spot of the widest shot.Daytime color is good. Easy to install.I wish there were better instructions on how to take advantage of the many settings. I played with them for a while but it seems that going back to the default settings worked the best.You have to change the settings right at the camera which you cannot see the results without going back into the house to look at the monitor. They all seem to work that way.( the nature of the beast)

Reviews.Title: Best deal I found
Reviews.Author: diy
Reviews.Content: Can't beat it for the money . I bought one it worked great so I bought another . only time will tell.

Reviews.Title: Bad camera.
Reviews.Author: ALLEN SALAMAT
Reviews.Content: This camera is just ok at day time, but as soon as sun barely goes down the picture quality gets really bad. I have 4 more camera with 540TVL and their picture quality beats this  so called 700TVL camera. I will not recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: now this is what I am talking about
Reviews.Author: Carlton Lee
Reviews.Content: Yes this camera is everything a good camara should be the clarity picture and the distance of focus it what I was looking for

Reviews.Title: great resolution and color clarity
Reviews.Author: Stephen Schwartz
Reviews.Content: this is the second one of these i purchased to upgrade my security camera system. it gives great flexibility, is easy to adjust as far as focal  length and focus. works great. the first one has been trouble free in the system for over a year, so i felt confident with this additional purchase of the same unit

Reviews.Title: Works as expected.
Reviews.Author: Norman F.
Reviews.Content: The camera workes as advertised right out of the box. My second one, Night vision is good and LED's iluminate very well. Recommend.

Reviews.Title: Very good Camera's for the price
Reviews.Author: Ken Dillard "Pinnypincher"
Reviews.Content: I purchased three of these to replace my systems original cameras. The picture and resolution is much better and I am able to see much further .

Reviews.Title: GW security STAY AWAY
Reviews.Author: Cisco M.
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these cameras, upon receiving them one of the cameras had screws jammed up into the rain guard and missing screws other camera showed signs of possible use as the base was scratched to the point that the white paint was removed to bare metal and rattled like a maraca since something was lose inside. Upon contacting GW they sent a return label and off the package went to CA. About 3 weeks later replacement cameras arrived long and behold the same cameras with the same markings and same number of missing screws were sent back. Upon contacting GW they stated they opened up the maraca i.e. camera and fixed what was lose and offered a $15.00 credit which they did. At the end of it all the cameras don't work after installing them. STAY AWAY

Reviews.Title: alright
Reviews.Author: patel123
Reviews.Content: not as good  as other cameras can find better cameras for cheaper. better buy another on for 69 bucks not a good deal

ProductInfo.Features:
1/3-Inch SONY EXview HAD CCD II; Enhanced Features and Fine Image Processor
Zoom & focus outside adjusting; Suitable for wall & celling installing
Auto Gain Control; Auto Electronic Shutter
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security 700TVL CCTV Security Outdoor Surveillance Video Camera - 700 TV Lines, 1/3-Inch Sony Exview HAD CCD II with Effio-E DSP Devices, 2.8-12mm Varifocal Lens
